author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA (delivering the judgment of the court ex tempore):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeal No 194 of 2020
casename: Abdul Kahar bin Othman v Public Prosecutor
coram: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA, Tay Yong Kwang JCA and Woo Bih Li JAD
counsel: The appellant in person; Anandan Bala and Samuel Yap (Attorney-General’s Chambers) for the respondent.

headings.text: Whether the appellant had additional sources of income
Whether the sum of $60,000 should have been included in the appellant’s benefits derived from drug trafficking
Whether the sum of $60,000 constitutes realisable property within the meaning of s 2(1) of the CDSA

tags: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Confiscation and forfeiture
